4306760.name: Evercrown
4306760.description:
A turn-based tactical roguelike where your heroes’ actions are decided by a slot machine.

Each turn, spin for abilities, lock the best slots, reroll up to twice, and adapt your strategy based on visible enemy intentions.

Build powerful synergies, watch the numbers explode, and choose your fate: claim the throne… or push further in endless mode.

Controlled randomness. Tense decisions. Explosive power growth.
4306760.supported_languages: 法语, 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 德语
